taxon_name.authority: B. L. Robinson in A. Gray et al.
(Nuttall ex Torrey & A. Gray) A. Gray

taxon_identification.taxon_hierarchy: family brassicaceae;tribe physarieae;genus physaria;species didymocarpa;subspecies didymocarpa

bio:treatment.description: Trichomes somewhat spreading (on herbage), loose and spreading (on fruits). Basal leaves: blade margins repand to dentate. Fruits moderately inflated, (firm); ovules 8 per ovary. 2n = 16, 24, 56?
Gravel bars, steep shale outcrops, rocky flats, gravelly prairies, talus slopes, dry hillsides, road cuts, mountains and foothills;
Alta., B.C.; Idaho, Mont., Wash., Wyo.
